text: DRAFT – NGI access terms for Dexter Steis. Guest login provides read-only access to NGI indices on EOL for the SoCal Border hub. Pricing is indicative only and may change before final approval.
FINAL APPROVAL – NGI access for Dexter Steis. Enron Trading approves a guest ID for NGI access on EOL. Access covers SoCal Border index data and is intended to support fair index formation.

DETAILS – The guest ID for Dexter Steis is valid through January of the following year, subject to Enron credit approval. If any issues arise, Dexter should contact Phillip Allen or the Enron credit desk.
